title: I’m an NPC - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Sci-fi   Yaoi
tags: Acting   Artificial Intelligence   Body Tempering   Celebrities   Charismatic Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Cultivation   Determined Protagonist   Game Elements   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Abilities   Identity Crisis   Incest   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Magical Space   Modern Day   Previous Life Talent   Reversible Couple   Showbiz   Siblings   Strong Love Interests   Time Travel   Transmigration   Transported to Another World
author: Qing Rugu   倾如故
description:
Others bring with them their online gaming skills when they cross-over, but what if there is an NPC from the game that crosses to reality?

An NPC from the much acclaimed Samsara, Emperor Shixi dies, only to awaken in the world of the strangers who invaded his lands.>
